title: Saturday Night Live
brief_description: A late-night live television sketch comedy and variety show created by Lorne Michaels. The show’s comedy sketches, which parody contemporary culture and politics, are performed by a large and varying cast of repertory and newer cast members. Each episode is hosted by a celebrity guest, who usually delivers an opening monologue and performs in sketches with the cast, and features performances by a musical guest.

constellations_other.name: Women and crime
constellations_other.description: The allure and fascination of dangerous women and women in danger.
